signup.passwordHintText: Password must contain 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter and one number.
signup.enableAuthenticatorSubtitle: In order to create your account you need to be validated with two factor authentication.
signup.qrCodeText: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app.
signup.authenticatorCodeHint: If you need to repeat this step please delete your old linked QR code. Old codes will not work to authenticate.
signup.accountCreatedSubtitle: You can now start trading on the Neutral platform
